Guys - this is the real deal as as good as it gets. 

This is the first film to use 3ality technology for 3D. As a result the movie is not converted from 2D to 3D. Its shot directly in 3D. 

Hence, this film may not look as bright & vibrant as other copies. you get amazing details nevertheless. You just need to change the picture settings to Dynamic or change the contract, brightness and backlit options.

ENJOY! and Thanks BOZX once again !
It's amazing how many people still don't understand that movies are not shot in 16:9. I guess they'll be waiting a very long time for those 1920x1080 versions.
